item.title: Complete Go Tutorial
item.author: Author
item.description: This is going to be the first long form post on this blog. We will review the Go language. I will try to introduce the reader to the fundamental concepts and spend more time trying to see what makes Go so special. First things first, if you are coming from the world of Python, Javascript or PHP - Go is a compiled and a statically typed language. It is much closer to C in that respect.
